insert into tbl_user(user_code, user_id, user_name, user_pw, user_address, user_phone, user_email, chk_ad) values(seq_user.nextval, #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_pw}, #{user_address}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email}, #{chk_ad})
